caption: API
description: The API, or Application Programming Interface, object represents  information pertaining to an API request and response.
name: api

group.description: The information pertaining to the API group.

request.description: Details pertaining to the API request.

response.description: Details pertaining to the API response.

service.description: The information pertaining to the API service.

token.description: The API or client token used to authenticate or authorize the API request. This attribute contains a token object that represents: (1) IdP-issued tokens such as Okta API tokens or Microsoft Entra ID Application Registration client secrets, or (2) generic API keys used for SaaS application authentication. Use this attribute when the API request was authenticated using a token that should be tracked as part of the API activity event.

version.description: The version of the API service.
